name: Star Wars: T7-64
description:
A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away...

Base N, a mining site and treasure vault, has been abandoned for quite some time, minus the presence of a crafty T7 astromech that intends to keep it that way. 

But by some stroke of misfortune, an army of Battle Droids has discovered the lost base, and is hellbent on claiming it, and its treasure. How long can T7-64 defend the base before they break into the vaults and steal everything?

This game was created for the Star Wars Fan Game Jam. Please note that it is incomplete, and may see further updates in the near future. If you should encounter a bug, please let me know so that I can look into it. Thank you!

View on GitHub
